llm_res.rule: Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
transferFrom function should return true on successful transfer.
Returns the name of the token - e.g. 'MyToken'.
